thread.title: By Chloe Arrives in Boston Next Week With So Much Vegan Food
thread.title_full: By Chloe Arrives in Boston Next Week With So Much Vegan Food

author: Dana Hatic
title: By Chloe Arrives in Boston Next Week With So Much Vegan Food
text: By Chloe Arrives in Boston Next Week With So Much Vegan Food The New York-based restaurant group is opening in the Seaport (and later, Fenway) Guac burger from By Chloe Mikey Pozarik for By Chloe A much-anticipated restaurant that specializes in fully vegan fare is almost ready for its Boston debut. By Chloe opens its first Massachusetts restaurant in Boston’s Seaport District on Thursday, February 23, according to Boston Magazine , bringing an array of burgers, sandwiches, salads, and so much more — all vegan — to 107 Seaport Blvd. Boston’s By Chloe (stylized as by CHLOE.) will feature a number of the restaurant’s signature dishes, including a guac burger topped with tortilla sticks, salsa, chipotle aioli, and guacamole; a pesto meatball sub made with mushroom and veggie meatballs; macaroni and “cheese” with a sweet potato cashew sauce; and a whiskey barbecue sandwich made with mushrooms, seitan, kale, onion marmalade, grilled pineapple, and a bourbon barbecue sauce. There will also be a handful of Boston-specific entrees and desserts. The company’s executive chef Manuel Trevino and pastry chef Richard Leach oversaw the development of the menu, with help from contributing chef Candice Hutchings of Edgy Veg. Pesto meatball sandwich Mikey Pozarik for By Chloe In addition to the Seaport opening, By Chloe has another location planned for Fenway that is supposed to open in April at 100 Van Ness St.
